snippet: The loss for the 2015 fiscal year reflects continued erosion in the delivery of first-class mail as well as expensive mandates for funding retiree health care.
abstract: Postal Service reports $5.1 billion loss for 2015 fiscal year.
lead_paragraph: The loss for the 2015 fiscal year reflects continued erosion in the delivery of first-class mail as well as expensive mandates for funding retiree health care.

headline.main: Postal Service Reports Loss of $5.1. Billion
headline.print_headline: Postal Service Reports Loss of $5.1. Billion
